channel.title: EverlongPk
channel.description:
[size=12pt][center][font=trebuchet ms][u]EverlongPk[/u][/font][/center][/size]
[center][u]Updates[/u]
16/2/10
Fixed all level requirements from Bronze to rune to dragon to barrows. All should be correct now. Fixed a bug where you could range and mage at the same time if you clicked fast. Started work on a new mini-game. Fixed up Pk following =) http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=aacgpg&s=6
17/2/10
Added bonus for alot of items e.g 3rd age and random stuff. Added a zone for the mini-game, the coords don't seem to want to work? If anyone could get me Castle wars coords into a safe zone, I'd love you. Cannot leave the mini-game with the items you get given. Created a way to get to the mini-game, you need a ghostspeak amulet and a rope, you use the rope on the well in edgeville, go to a cave and if you don't have 27 free slots & a ghost speak amulet he won't talk to you. Once teleported you get a full inventory of food and gear for hybriding. Fixed a bug where you could exit the mini-game with items.
18/2/10
Couldnt fix the damn zone bug so I slacked and didn't do much. Just a few minor bug fixes.
19/2/10
Fixed up woodcutting a bit. Began adding a mini-quest for runecrafting (Abyss) Perfected pk points, you get 2 for a kill, you need 10 for the ghostspeak amulet, you don't get points if you kill the same guy twice in a row, you get rewards for the more you get. Thinking of adding a shop for them. Fixed more bugs..
20/2/10
Fixed a bug when you teleport in the mini-game you would get stuck in the teleport animation - when you teleport all your items get removed, this was causing a bug in the teleporting method so I rewrote the remove items and it's all good now. Added monsters to train on and a few commands. Fixed npc emotes up.
21/2/10
[IMG]http://i192.photobucket.com/albums/z117/kurtaylor/Pkpoints.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i192.photobucket.com/albums/z117/kurtaylor/crafting.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i192.photobucket.com/albums/z117/kurtaylor/craftingdhide.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i192.photobucket.com/albums/z117/kurtaylor/dhidedone.jpg[/img]
Current Features
-Firemaking -Woodcutting -A very good mini-game -Smithing -Fishing -Agility -Thieving -Herblore -Mining -Crafting -Runecrafting - -Excellent combat -Following -PkPoints -So much more [/center]

item.title: EverlongPk
item.dc:creator: @Rage-Pk -Rage-Pk
item.description:
@Rage-Pk wrote:

All the items are untradeable, I tried doing a shop but it was buggy so I removed it for the time being.

And yes, it is.

Ty

Read full topic

item.title: EverlongPk
item.dc:creator: @Manzarth Manzarth
item.description:
@Manzarth wrote:

Looks ok. Is this your first server? Oh and you should definatley add a shop for the pk points. Make the items you put in the shop untradeable so that the items are worth more and therefore it gives the players an incentive to pk!

Read full topic

item.title: EverlongPk
item.dc:creator: @Rage-Pk -Rage-Pk
item.description:
@Rage-Pk wrote:

[size=12pt][center][font=trebuchet ms]EverlongPk[/font][/center][/size]

[center]Updates

16/2/10

Fixed all level requirements from Bronze to rune to dragon to barrows. All should be correct now.
Fixed a bug where you could range and mage at the same time if you clicked fast.
Started work on a new mini-game.
Fixed up Pk following =) http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=aacgpg&s=6

17/2/10

Added bonus for alot of items e.g 3rd age and random stuff.
Added a zone for the mini-game, the coords don’t seem to want to work? If anyone could get me Castle wars coords into a safe zone, I’d love you.
Cannot leave the mini-game with the items you get given.
Created a way to get to the mini-game, you need a ghostspeak amulet and a rope, you use the rope on the well in edgeville, go to a cave and if you don’t have 27 free slots & a ghost speak amulet he won’t talk to you. Once teleported you get a full inventory of food and gear for hybriding.
Fixed a bug where you could exit the mini-game with items.

18/2/10

Couldnt fix the damn zone bug so I slacked and didn’t do much. Just a few minor bug fixes.

19/2/10

Fixed up woodcutting a bit.
Began adding a mini-quest for runecrafting (Abyss)
Perfected pk points, you get 2 for a kill, you need 10 for the ghostspeak amulet, you don’t get points if you kill the same guy twice in a row, you get rewards for the more you get. Thinking of adding a shop for them.
Fixed more bugs…

20/2/10

Fixed a bug when you teleport in the mini-game you would get stuck in the teleport animation - when you teleport all your items get removed, this was causing a bug in the teleporting method so I rewrote the remove items and it’s all good now.
Added monsters to train on and a few commands.
Fixed npc emotes up.

21/2/10

Current Features

-Firemaking

-A very good mini-game

-Excellent combat
